concept.title: Splash Lubrication System
concept.shortdesc: The lubrication system features a simplified design with fewer oiling points, utilizing a central oil reservoir in the crank case to lubricate engine and transmission components.

section.title: System Overview
section.p: The splash system distinguishes itself through its simplified design. The system utilizes a single large oil reservoir located in the crank case, which services most engine and transmission components through splash lubrication.

ul.li: Good light grade lubricating oil for all oil cups and engine components
Regular oil maintenance for the commutator
